## Production de sciage


```{r, echo=TRUE}
sciage = read_csv('sciage.csv',show_col_types = FALSE, col_types = cols(REG = col_character()))
```

```{r}
res.ca=CA(sciage[,1:16], graph=FALSE, col.sup=c(14,15),quali.sup=16 )
```

```{r}

```
